name: 47 Degrees
description:
47 Degrees is a global consulting and development firm specializing in helping clients take the next step in modernizing legacy applications to be real-time, secure, and responsive, by using battle-tested functional programming and cutting-edge technologies including Scala, Kotlin, Swift, Spark, Kafka, Akka, and Cassandra. 
Our team is comprised of a unique set of individuals, specializing in their own respective fields of development. Since 2010, we have used our expertise to build, deploy, and innovate applications for clients and internal projects alike. We're active open source creators and advocates and host a number of functional programming conferences across the globe. 
47 Degrees is headquartered in Seattle, USA with offices in Cádiz and Madrid, Spain, and London, UK.
